member.name: T:Core.Common.Entity
member.summary: Base class for all entities in the domain. Provides common properties and behavior for domain entities.

member.name: P:Core.Common.Entity.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the entity.

member.name: P:Core.Common.Entity.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the entity was created.

member.name: P:Core.Common.Entity.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the entity was last updated.

member.name: M:Core.Common.Entity.SetUpdated
member.summary: Updates the entity's UpdatedAt timestamp.

member.name: T:Core.Common.IAggregateRoot
member.summary: Marker interface for aggregate roots in the domain. Aggregate roots are entities that are roots of an aggregate and maintain its invariants.

member.name: T:Core.Enums.NotificationStatus
member.summary: Represents the current status of a notification.

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationStatus.Pending
member.summary: Notification is pending to be sent.

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationStatus.Sent
member.summary: Notification has been sent to the provider.

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationStatus.Failed
member.summary: Notification failed to be sent.

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationStatus.Delivered
member.summary: Notification has been successfully delivered to the recipient.

member.name: T:Core.Enums.NotificationType
member.summary: Represents the type of notification to be sent.

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationType.Email
member.summary: Email notification type.

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationType.Sms
member.summary: SMS (text message) notification type.

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationType.Push
member.summary: Push notification type (mobile/web).

member.name: F:Core.Enums.NotificationType.Webhook
member.summary: Webhook notification type (HTTP callbacks).

member.name: T:Core.Interfaces.IAuditLogger
member.summary: Interface for audit logging operations

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuditLogger.LogNotificationSentAsync(Core.Models.NotificationMessage,Core.Models.NotificationResult,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a successful notification send operation
member.param: The notification message that was sent
The result of the send operation
The user ID who initiated the operation

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuditLogger.LogNotificationFailedAsync(Core.Models.NotificationMessage,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a failed notification send operation
member.param: The notification message that failed to send
The error message
The user ID who initiated the operation

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuditLogger.LogAuthenticationFailureAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs authentication failure
member.param: The username that failed authentication
The IP address of the request
The reason for authentication failure

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuditLogger.LogAuthenticationSuccessAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs successful authentication
member.param: The username that was authenticated
The IP address of the request

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuditLogger.LogAuthorizationFailureAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs authorization failure
member.param: The user ID that failed authorization
The resource being accessed
The action being performed
The IP address of the request

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuditLogger.LogSecurityEventAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Logs a security event
member.param: The type of security event
Description of the event
The user ID associated with the event (optional)
The IP address of the request (optional)
Additional data related to the event

member.name: T:Core.Interfaces.IAuthService
member.summary: Interface for authentication operations

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuthService.AuthenticateAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token if successful
member.param: The username to authenticate
The password for authentication
member.returns: A JWT token if authentication is successful, null otherwise

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuthService.ValidateCredentialsAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates user credentials
member.param: The username to validate
The password to validate
member.returns: True if credentials are valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.IAuthService.GetUserRoleAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the user role for the given username
member.param: The username to get role for
member.returns: The user role if found, null otherwise

member.name: T:Core.Interfaces.IMetricsRecorder
member.summary: Interface for recording notification metrics

member.summary: Record a notification event for metrics collection
member.param: Notification type
Whether the notification was successful
Response time in milliseconds
Error message if failed
User ID who initiated the notification

member.name: T:Core.Interfaces.NullMetricsRecorder
member.summary: Null implementation for when metrics are disabled

member.name: T:Core.Interfaces.INotificationService
member.summary: High-level service for sending notifications.

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.INotificationService.SendAsync(Core.Enums.NotificationType,Core.Models.NotificationMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a notification using the appropriate strategy for the specified type.
member.param: The type of notification to send.
The notification message to send.
A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A NotificationResult indicating the success or failure of the operation.

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.INotificationService.SendBatchAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{Core.Enums.NotificationType,Core.Models.NotificationMessage},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends multiple notifications in parallel using appropriate strategies.
member.param: A dictionary mapping notification types to their messages.
A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A dictionary mapping notification types to their results.

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.INotificationService.GetSupportedTypes
member.summary: Gets the supported notification types.
member.returns: An enumerable of supported notification types.

member.name: T:Core.Interfaces.INotificationStrategy
member.summary: Defines a strategy for sending notifications of a specific type.

member.name: P:Core.Interfaces.INotificationStrategy.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of notification this strategy handles.

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.INotificationStrategy.SendAsync(Core.Models.NotificationMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a notification using this strategy.
member.param: The notification message to send.
A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A NotificationResult indicating the success or failure of the operation.

member.name: T:Core.Interfaces.INotificationStrategyFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating notification strategy instances.

member.name: M:Core.Interfaces.INotificationStrategyFactory.GetStrategy(Core.Enums.NotificationType)
member.summary: Gets a notification strategy for the specified notification type.
member.param: The type of notification to get a strategy for.
member.returns: A strategy instance that can handle the specified notification type.
member.exception: Thrown when no strategy is available for the specified type.

member.name: T:Core.Models.NotificationMessage
member.summary: Represents a notification message to be sent.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationMessage.To
member.summary: Gets the recipient of the notification.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationMessage.Subject
member.summary: Gets the subject of the notification.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationMessage.Body
member.summary: Gets the body content of the notification.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationMessage.Metadata
member.summary: Gets additional metadata associated with the notification.

member.name: M:Core.Models.NotificationMessage.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NotificationMessage class.
member.param: The recipient of the notification.
The subject of the notification.
The body content of the notification.
Additional metadata for the notification (optional).
member.exception: Thrown when required parameters are null or empty.

member.name: M:Core.Models.NotificationMessage.WithMetadata(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Creates a new NotificationMessage with updated metadata.

member.returns: A new NotificationMessage instance with updated metadata.

member.name: T:Core.Models.NotificationResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a notification delivery attempt.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationResult.Success
member.summary: Gets whether the notification was successfully sent.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationResult.MessageId
member.summary: Gets the unique message identifier from the notification provider.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationResult.Error
member.summary: Gets the error message if the notification failed.

member.name: P:Core.Models.NotificationResult.SentAt
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the notification was sent.

member.name: M:Core.Models.NotificationResult.Succeeded(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a successful notification result.
member.param: The unique message identifier from the provider.

member.name: M:Core.Models.NotificationResult.Succeeded(System.String,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Creates a successful notification result with a specific timestamp.
member.param: The unique message identifier from the provider.
The timestamp when the notification was sent.

member.name: M:Core.Models.NotificationResult.Failed(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a failed notification result.
member.param: The error message describing the failure.
